00020 //! dot product operation 
00021 
00022 class op_dot
00023   {
00024   public:
00025   
00026   template<typename eT>

00033   inline static typename T1::elem_type apply(const Base<typename T1::elem_type,T1>& A_orig, const Base<typename T1::elem_type,T2>& B_orig);
00034   };
